instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b
threads.message: Fans rotate at full speed and it is also very slow to enter the system, apple service diagnostic report Th1H Fin Stack Proximity Sensor Reads Within Operating Range

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b
threads.message: If no other error when continuing on error, <TRANSISTOR>Q5520</TRANSISTOR>.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b
threads.message:
Run ASD test in Continue mode.
See if more errors pop up.

Disconnect webcan and check if still the same.
Try known good trackpad board/flex.
